Join us today!

Who are we?

We are HaCS - Hackathon and Computing Society and Birmingham City University. HaCS focuses on bringing together like mind, technology enthusiastic people to combine knowledge and create a fantastic network of people. Whatever classes you study, faculty you belong to, theirs always room for you here!
